---
title: "Normal-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rnorm-0-5.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Norm05Call <- stream_in(file("rnorm-0-5-Call-Revised-0409.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Norm05Result <- stream_in(file("rnorm-0-5_0409_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Normal.0.5.OpenAI <- left_join(Norm05Call,Norm05Result)
Full.Normal.0.5.0409 <- left_join(Normal05$params, Normal.0.5.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Normal.0.5.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Normal.0.5.0409$Outcome <- map_chr(Normal05$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Norm05Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Normal.0.5.0409$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Normal.0.5.0409, file="Full.Normal.0.5.0409.RData")
```
